stocks.impact_theory: Keysight reported blowout Q1 FY2026 earnings with 23% revenue growth driven by AI infrastructure testing demand, record orders up 30%, and raised FY2026 guidance to 20%+ growth. Economic implications: Validates sustained AI capex boom. Market psychology: Earnings beats in AI supply chain boost confidence amid broader AI angst. Historical parallels: Similar to 2023 AI rally for test/measure firms like KEYS post-NVDA surge. Analogies: Like a pit crew fueling F1 cars during a race (testing AI hardware); oil rig booming on shale discovery (AI data center buildout).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Strong earnings beat, AI tailwinds, positive X sentiment (posts highlight double beat, orders surge). Web news confirms premarket +15%. Sustained momentum expected.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 20-30% upside on AI ramp; target $340.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short if guidance cut post-earnings; potential 5-10% pullback.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Broader AI slowdown, competition from Teradyne, high valuation.

stocks.justification: Clear earnings catalyst, aligned news/X sentiment, strong historical reaction to beats.

stocks.impact_theory: Anthropic launched AI tool for COBOL modernization, threatening IBM's legacy mainframe/consulting revenue (high-margin). Economic: Accelerates AI disruption to $10B+ legacy IT market. Psychology: Fear of moat erosion in AI era triggers panic selling. Parallels: Palantir/legacy software drops on genAI; IBM's 2022 inflation dip. Analogies: Like Kodak ignoring digital cameras; taxi cabs vs Uber.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: 13% drop yesterday worst since 2000; X posts amplify AI threat fears. News widespread on disruption. Sentiment negative.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long dip if oversold; +15% rebound to $260.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short for further 10-20% decline amid AI rotation.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: IBM pivots to AI successfully, tariff benefits as US firm.

stocks.justification: Dramatic single-event drop with high media/X coverage.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 earnings beat with comp sales +0.4% vs expected decline, raised dividend. Implications: Housing steady despite rates; pro customer demand. Psychology: Defensive retail win amid tariffs/AI volatility. Parallels: 2021 home improvement surge. Analogies: Like grocery stores in recession (essentials hold); ship steadying in storm.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Beat estimates after misses; X positive on housing/mortgage drop. Premarket +2.7%.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 10% gains on housing rebound.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Higher rates, consumer slowdown, tariffs on imports.

stocks.justification: Solid beat but conservative guidance tempers enthusiasm.

stocks.impact_theory: META deal for 6GW AI compute (~$100B+), warrants up to 10% stake on milestones. Implications: Validates AMD as #2 AI GPU player. Psychology: Hyperscaler commitment crushes credibility doubts. Parallels: MSFT-OpenAI boosting NVDA. Analogies: Like Pepsi outselling Coke in new market; underdog boxer landing title shot.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Massive deal news, X buzzing (15% jump), web confirms multi-year commitment.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 30%+ to $250 on AI share gains.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Execution misses, NVDA dominance, warrants dilution.

stocks.justification: Hyperscale anchor deal rare, strong sentiment shift.

stocks.impact_theory: Part of AMD deal secures AI compute diversification vs NVDA reliance. Implications: Front-loading AI capex $100B+. Psychology: Strategic diversification positive, but warrants dilution minor. Parallels: AWS multi-cloud shift. Analogies: Airline hedging fuel (compute supply); diversifying supplier like Apple chips.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: AI buildout commitment; X focuses on AMD but META benefits. Minor dilution offset by scale.

stocks.justification: Positive but secondary to AMD; mixed X focus.
